trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Broken Arrow
There were no other sightings in Broken Arrow on or around May 3rd 2010
Summary: Grayish mass low over trees heading south to north.
divs: Sighting Details I often glance up at the sky for a few moments when heading to the car or coming in, especially at night. I was headed to the store about 10:30pm and before getting into the car I just happened to catch sight of a grayish mass low over the trees headed south to north. I couldn't really make out a distinct shape. Just a grayish mass moving about 40 MPH. No lights or sound. The first thing that crossed my mind was a small aircraft but I quickly dismissed that idea since there was no sound or lights. Even though the first impression was of a single object, I wondered if it might have been a tight flock of light colored birds although I couldn't see any individual birds but I was mostly just trying to think of something that might make more sense. The object appeared to be about a block away and was about three times as long as it was thick. If the estimate on distance is correct, the object would have been 25-30 feet long.I watched the object for 5 or 6 seconds and lost sight of it due to the glare of a much closer streetlight. I continues scanning the sky for a few more minutes but nothing else unusual was seen.
